title.rendered: Hobart vs Sydney, Australian T20 League, 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Hobart: Caleb Jewell, Ben McDermott, Zak Crawley, Matthew Wade (c & wk), Tim David, D’Arcy Short, Mitchell Owen, Faheem Ashraf, Joel Paris, Nathan Ellis, Riley Meredith

Sydney: Josh Philippe (wk), Steven Smith, Kurtis Patterson, Moises Henriques (c), Jordan Silk, Hayden Kerr, Daniel Christian, Ben Dwarshuis, Sean Abbott, Steve O’Keefe, Todd Murphy

Venue: Bellerive Oval, Hobart

Pitch Report

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 148

2nd innings average score: 174

Wickets per innings: 6

Type: Decent batting wicket

Wins

Batting 1st: —

Batting 2nd: 100%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Nathan Ellis loves bowling at Hobart. In 19 outings, he has bagged 30 wickets, including the best figures of 4 for 27. Moreover, he is yet to go wicketless at the venue this season.

It has not been a very productive time with the bat for Ben McDermott lately. However, he has accumulated 888 runs at 39, including the highest score of 110* at the Bellerive Oval.

With consecutive centuries and a 36 in his very first game of the edition, it has been a hat-trick of appearances in the Ultimate Team for Steven Smith.

When these teams met earlier in the tournament, Hayden Kerr and Josh Phillipe were the captain and vice-captain of the Ultimate Team respectively.

Given the friendly batting conditions at the Bellerive Oval, 5 top-order batters, including 3 openers, have registered a half-century in the last 3 games.

There have been 2 four-wicket hauls at the venue in the last 3 matches. Interestingly, both belong to the seamers.
